text: Ej Parvardigori mo, moro ʙa saʙaʙi gunohamon ʙaroi kofiron fitanae magardon va onhoro ʙar mo ƣoliʙ magardon, to nagūjand agar onho (ja'ne, ahli imon) ʙarhaq meʙudand, ʙa azoʙu xorī giriftor nameşudand, pas ongoh in ʙoisi zijodşavii kufri onon meşavad. Va gunohoni moro ʙijomurz, ki haroina, Tu pirūzmandī, hargiz maƣluʙ nameşavī va dar guftoru korhojat ʙo hikmat hastī
